author: Kris Holt
title: Apple M3 MacBook Pros are up to $200 off for Black Friday
description:
It has only been a couple of weeks since Apple debuted its M3-powered MacBook Pros, but most variants are already on sale for Black Friday. For instance, you can snap up the base 14-inch M3 MacBook Pro for $1,449
. That's $150 off the standard price.
